title: OneStream Formatting Issues and Fixes Discussion
summary: Discussed inconsistencies in OneStream number formatting, including counts shown as currency, improper variance formatting, and negative value display. Clarified root causes and drafted a clean email response to stakeholders. User requested to save the conversation to the team archive.

messages.content: Subject: RE: OneStream Number Formatting Issues ... can you write this out nice and clean
Here’s a polished, tight, and professional version...
Save this conversation to my team archive

key_points: Identified root causes of inconsistent numeric formatting in OneStream outputs
Outlined architectural explanation for why formatting drift occurs
Provided polished stakeholder communication for issue resolution
Prepared conversation for archival per user request
